movie.title: Nixon
movie.plot: An epic look at President Richard M. Nixon—a man carrying the fate of the world on his shoulders while battling the self-destructive demands from within—spanning his troubled boyhood in California to the shocking Watergate scandal that would end his Presidency.
movie.awards: Nominated for 4 Oscars. Another 11 wins & 14 nominations.

events.title: the "White House Plumbers" break in to Watergate
Nixon secretly records the "smoking gun" tape
